title: freakdust123
author: freakdust123
content: Hi, we are currently looking for shiller and moderator on our new project coming this second month of june. If you are interested, feel free to cantact me via telegram with this username:@RariecatWe will be happy ro work with you.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: let's do it yourself with your Sock puppet account.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Imagine!A person who is a fraud who used to cheat on Bounties using his alt accounts now looking for people to shill his new scam service!This cryptocurrency universe has really suffered with such individuals!

comments.author: freakdust123
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 06, 2022, 10:46:30 PMImagine!A person who is a fraud who used to cheat on Bounties using his alt accounts now looking for people to shill his new scam service!This cryptocurrency universe has really suffered with such individuals!https://i.imgur.com/nrbonEX.pngIt is not my project, Im also working as shiller, and the company I worked with is looking for more shillers.
